Redding.Bethel Church (Redding, California): Bethel Church is a non-denominational charismatic megachurch, that was established in 1954 in Redding, California. The church, which is currently being led by Bill Johnson, is notable for their controversial ministry style, supernatural ministry school, and music label Bethel Music. There have been many articles, both in print publications and online, written about Bethel and their ministry, including in the Record Searchlight, Christianity Today, and Charisma magazine.
